sources.name: positiveovertidfil
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> positiveovertidfil

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared positiveovertidfil = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://datalake20210906.dfs.core.windows.net/coviddata/Test_pos_over_time.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ";", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = positiveovertidfil,
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"Date", "NewPositive", "PosPct"}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Removed other columns", each Text.Contains([Date], "-")),
  #"Replaced value" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Filtered rows", ".", "", Replacer.ReplaceText, {"NewPositive"}),
  #"Replaced value 1" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Replaced value", ",", ".", Replacer.ReplaceText, {"PosPct"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Replaced value 1", {{"NewPositive", Int64.Type}, {"PosPct", type number}})
in
  #"Changed column type";
